name: cfstopwatch
description: Measures the time taken, in milliseconds, for the code between the start tag and end tag to execute.

params.name: variable
params.description: The name of the variable that will contain the value of the time taken.

params.name: label
params.description: The label for the stopwatch, used in debugging output.

examples.title: Tag version
examples.code:
<cfstopwatch variable="stopwatchVar" label="Nap time">
Begin some long running process ...
<cfset sleep(2000)>
done.
</cfstopwatch><cfdump var="stopwatchVar">
examples.result: The time elapsed while executing the code inside the <cfstopwatch> block is returned as a variable then displayed below.

examples.title: Script version
examples.result: The time elapsed while executing the code inside the <cfstopwatch> block is returned as a variable then displayed below.
